sub_title: Senior Health Safety Environment (HSE) Specialist | EHS manager
summary:
I am a senior Safety and environmental engineer with over 14 years of experience.
I am enthusiastic, motivated and result-driven with strong communication and technical skills in process, construction and technical safety. My technical background helps me to have a good understanding on the design issues and be able to work as a team-leader as well as an independent designer. I have worked as a global lead engineer in the past 6 years in various projects in the different industries.

- Global lead for safety in design and construction phases of different plants for breweries and oil& gas industry.
- Senior designer in Fire Fighting, process safety & HSE Engineering Design including Conceptual, Basic, FEED, and detailed engineering.
